posts.post_title: WTB/Seeking Trade For: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait (SGC Heavily Preferred)
posts.post_content:
Hey, looking for one in the 450-700 price range. The cleaner the better of course. Very much prefer centered and SGC.

Thanks!
